about_the_game:
Decorporate is a local multiplayer platform-fighter game. It can be played by 1 to 4 players on a single computer. Controls support both Keyboard, USB controller and Bluetooth controller devices. Players can also choose to fight AI controlled characters, with three different levels of difficulty.

The players control game characters who can Move horizontally, Jump, perform Attacks, or use their Special.

The game plays like a typical platform fighter, but when a player kills an enemy, they evolve, changing into a new character with different stats and a new Special ability.

Each character has a different Special ability:

  • Bull CEO: the most powerful being, who can charge in a horizontal line, damaging everything in his path and only stopping when hitting a wall.

  • Fox Manager: shoots in a horizontal line with a gun.

  • Sheep Employee: she bring death and destruction to her enemies with a devastating vertical jump kick attack.

  • Le Poulet : it's a chicken. Can rocket jump by shooting an explosive egg (downward vertical projectile).

  • Hamster Weeb: only has a non-damaging dash for mobility. Can destroy the anime cassette to evolve into an Ascended Weeb, who can in turn permanently eliminate enemies from the game.

There are three different Levels to fight on.

The game has multiple gamemodes:

  • Decorporate: basic gamemode: kill enemies to evolve in order to get to the Ascended Weeb evolution. Then, eliminate every other player on the field.

  • Brawl: players have limited lives. Kill the others before they kill you!

  • Otaku Outbreak: all againt one boss battle against a player-controlled Overpowered Ascended Weeb! Good luck!
